imdb.title: Hikari to mizu no Daphne
imdb.plot: In the distant future, the earth is almost entirely covered by the ocean, with only small islands and floating cities on the surface. 15-year-old Maia Mizuki is turned down by the prestigious Ocean Agency, despite her exceptional ...

episodes.title: Maia's Longest Day: Part 1
episodes.plot: Maia is having the worst day of her life. She gets rejected by the Ocean Agency, gets kicked out of her house, can't find a job that offers room and board, gets her wallet stolen and gets taken hostage and then shot.

episodes.title: Maia's Longest Day: Part 2
episodes.plot: Maia is involved in a detainee exchange that goes bad.

episodes.title: There's No Business Like Nereid's Business
episodes.plot: Maia and Shizuka solve the mystery of Martin's missing wedding money. Trouble is lying in wait for Rena in the form of a blonde woman.

episodes.title: Chaka Chaka Bang Bang
episodes.plot: Gloria returns to Nereids. She decides to teach Maia how the work should be done.

episodes.title: The Hooligan's Return
episodes.plot: Maia is introduced to a martial arts expert named Yu Park. Rena and detective Yagi are taken hostage while on a cruise ship.

episodes.title: The Great Nighttime Manhunt
episodes.plot: Maia gets partnered with Gloria and Yu and discovers the tense relationship they have.

episodes.title: All That, Papa
episodes.plot: The branch manager's daughter discovers he has been lying to her about his role at work. The gang catches a group of poachers.

episodes.title: Risk Everything for Speed
episodes.plot: Maia takes the wheel of a test vehicle when Shizuka's childhood friend, Millie, is injured.

episodes.title: I'm the Only One Without a Tomorrow
episodes.plot: Gloria is told she has a week to live.

episodes.title: Siberian Special Vacation
episodes.plot: The girls go to Siberia City where slave traders kidnap Shizuka.

episodes.title: Like This for a Long Visit
episodes.plot: When Maia passes a laurel tree it sparks old memories from her past. Everyone decides to spend an extra day in Siberia looking for clues about Maia's past.

episodes.title: The Day the World Surfaced
episodes.plot: The 100-year anniversary of the underwater cities raising to the surface is celebrated. The 100-year memorial service for the city of Elpida is also held. Maia, Tsukasa and Millie have a race to show off the Ocean Agency's new hovercraft.

episodes.title: Giving Hatred
episodes.plot: Wong, Chang and Lee along with their rescuer, May, seek revenge on Nereids for putting the three brothers in prison.

episodes.title: The Elderly and UMA
episodes.plot: Since the submarine is just sitting around and costing a fortune, Maia goes out and finds the Nereids a job.

episodes.title: The Great Surge: Part 1
episodes.plot: A boy runs away from home and Maia is sent to Siberia City to find him.

episodes.title: The Great Surge: Part 2
episodes.plot: Maia and the boy are caught in a plot to kill a wealthy CEO. Rena and Shizuka track down the people behind the plot.

episodes.title: Defeated by a Baby
episodes.plot: Yu finds an abandoned baby at her door.

episodes.title: Conflicts Winding Down
episodes.plot: A con artist plays with Shizuka's heart.

episodes.title: Submarine Does Not Rise to the Surface
episodes.plot: May, Wong, Chang and Lee steal the Agnes back. Maia gets taken hostage in an attempt to stop them.

episodes.title: Once Upon a Time in Siberia
episodes.plot: The stress of almost certain death in her rescue of the treasure hunters triggered Maia to remember an event from her past.

episodes.title: What Happened to Maia?
episodes.plot: Maia is unable to concentrate on her new mission which is to find a girl that has been kidnapped by the slave traders. Shizuka is injured due to Maia's lack of concentration.

episodes.title: Everyday Life of an Eye and Recollection
episodes.plot: Maia has memories of her past.

episodes.title: Escape from Kamchatka
episodes.plot: Maia is told the reason behind her false memories. Tony tells the Nereids about Maia's capture. Shizuka, Yu and Gloria quit Nereids on account of Rena's apparent cold-heartedness towards Maia's situation. Tsukasa returns from Greenland City and is immediately taken by Shizuka to help rescue Maia from the Ocean Agency.

episodes.title: Daphne in the Brilliant Blue
episodes.plot: While the treasure hunters chase off the Ocean Agency's pursuit vehicle, Maia descends into the shell of the city proper. Once inside memories flood her mind.

episodes.title: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Nereids but Were Afraid to Ask
episodes.plot: The Nereids make a PR video.

episodes.title: Heaven Can Wait for Maia Mizuki
episodes.plot: Gloria and Maia switch bodies.
